org.springframework.boot.web.reactive.context

接口 ConfigurableReactiveWebEnvironment

  • 所有超级接口:
    ConfigurableEnvironment, ConfigurablePropertyResolver, Environment, PropertyResolver
    所有已知实现类:
    StandardReactiveWebEnvironment

    public interface ConfigurableReactiveWebEnvironment
extends ConfigurableEnvironment
    Specialization of ConfigurableEnvironment for reactive application contexts.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.0
    另请参阅:
    ConfigurableApplicationContext.getEnvironment()
